msbt.message: Here we are! Halloween at last! It all goes down at 5 tonight, so there's still time left till the party starts.I can't possibly tell you how excited I am for this, !
If you're even half as hyped as I am for Halloween, then, uhthen that's a lot of hype, !I totally can't wait to start scaring the daylights out of everyone. Bwa ha ha! Just kidding.<10_4 /> Maybe.
I can't believe how much work goes into these events. Then they start, and you're likeit's so worth it!Halloween on starts tonight at 5. I'd better see you there, !
If you're not ready for Halloween, you'd better GET ready! The party starts at 5, !
It's probably time to get dressed for the Halloween thing, .Hey, quick question: What scares you the most? No, wait, it'll be more fun to guess.
This Halloween thing is gonna be so raaaaaaad, ! Can't wait!
You just know Halloween's coming when you start seeing pumpkin stuff, . It's gonna be so rad!
I'm really digging all the pumpkin stuff, but come on! I want there to be more, ! A lot more!
You can feel the Halloween hype all around us! The best day of the year is almost here, !
So many pumpkins. So many hiding places. Bwa ha ha! This Halloween's gonna be so much fun, !
